author: HymanZHAN
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 and PowerShell 7+ issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6?view=powershell-6).

-->

# Steps to reproduce

On WSL, go to a random directory, type `cd` and hit Tab.

# Expected behavior

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26806995/78275146-38575d00-74df-11ea-88e1-debb7d7f6a26.png)


# Actual behavior


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26806995/78275264-5cb33980-74df-11ea-93ab-7f95c9827b7a.png)


# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```shell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.0.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.0.0
OS                             Linux 4.19.84-microsoft-standard #1 SMP Wed Nov 13 11:44:37 UTC 2019
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: @HymanZHAN this is about a PSReadLine feature; MenuComplete is not handled by PowerShell itself. Could you file this over in the [PSReadLine](/PowerShell/PSReadLine) repository, please? 🙂

comments.author: HymanZHAN
comments.body: Ah OK. Sorry I didn't realize that. Thanks for the redirection.

title: MenuComplete does not highlight selected option on WSL 2
